org.openhubframework.openhub.common

Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.common.Tools

  • public final class Tools
extends Object
    Class with common methods for use. For usage look into test ToolsTest class.

      • joinNonEmpty

        public static String joinNonEmpty(String[] array,
                                  char separator)
        Joins the provided input Strings into one String, separated by the provided separator character. Null and empty elements are skipped.
        Parameters:
        array - an array of String to join together into one String
        separator - separator character to separate the array elements with
        Returns:
        the string merged from array, separated by the specified character

      • fm

        public static String fm(String message,
                        Object... values)
        Substitutes all places of the message using a values. See MessageFormatter for more detail.
        Parameters:
        message - the message with places defined as {}
        values - an array of values that are used to substitute formatting places of the message
        Returns:
        the final string
